meanings.sent1: The eagle outsoared the other birds in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The hot air balloon outsoared the treetops.
meanings.sent3: The paper airplane outsoared the competition, quite literally!
meanings.sent4: Her dreams outsoared the limitations of reality.
meanings.sent5: The rocket outsoared into the vast unknown, leaving a trail of fire behind.

meanings.sent1: The sun outsoared the clouds, shining brightly.
meanings.sent2: The skyscraper outsoared the surrounding buildings.
meanings.sent3: The kite outsoared the trees, much to the delight of the children.
meanings.sent4: His spirits outsoared his previous doubts, reaching new heights.
meanings.sent5: The mountain peak outsoared all others, offering a breathtaking view.
